name: Voolgo
overview:
Social Networks is the best viral selling channel. Right now only few companies know how to use Social Networks efficiently. Voolgo allows companies to sell over the Social Networks by identifying and their top influencers (ambassadors) motivating them to spread the message across the Social Networks and monitoring the ROI of a specific promotional campaign.

Voolgo is an online platform helping users to answer the following questions: How do my members react at my communication? Who are my ambassadors? Do I really earn money with Social Network campaigns?

Three simple steps: 1 -Select the social networks and define the right influencers for your campaign 2 - Define the rewarding system for your influencers. Create and launch your social network campaign. 3 - Grow your community, bind your influencers and monetize on your social network campaign.
